articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Jabeur advances to first WTA 1000 final in Madrid in style
articles.description: Tunisia's Ons Jabeur moved into the first WTA 1000 final of her career when she beat Russian qualifier Ekaterina Alexandrova 6-2 6-3 at the Madrid Open on Thursday.
articles.content: Jabeur advances to first WTA 100 final in Madrid in style

articles.title: IPL 2022: Stubbs replaces injured Tymal Mills in Mumbai Indians squad
articles.description: Mumbai Indians have signed South African keeper-batter Tristan Stubbs as a replacement for injured left-arm pacer Tymal Mills for the remainder of the Indian Premier League (IPL).

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: ICICI, BoB revise lending rates after RBI's repo rate hike
articles.description: ICICI Bank has revised the external benchmark lending rate (EBLR) to 8.10 per cent, and Bank of Baroda raised the rate to 6.90 per cent after the RBI hiked the key repo rate.
articles.content: ICICI, Bank of Baroda revise lending rates after RBI's repo rate hike

articles.title: Rublev eases past Evans to reach last eight in Madrid Open

articles.title: गया में पिंजरा छोड़ उड़ा तोता 'पोपो', सूचना देने पर ₹5100 इनाम
articles.description: Missing Parrot in Gaya : बिहार के गया में एक तोता लापता है। लापता तोता का नाम पोपो है। तोता मालिक ने गया के कई इलाकों में गुमशुदगी का इश्तेहार दीवारों पर चिपकाया है। इश्तेहार में लिखा हुआ है कि जो भी पोपो के बारे में जानकारी देगा उसे ₹5100 का इनाम दिया जाएगा।

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: English actor Stephen Fry nominated new MCC president
articles.description: British actor Stephen Fry will become the next president of the Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC), a year after he advocated for change following a racism scandal that shook English cricket.

articles.description: New-age logistics startup Delhivery has fixed a price band of Rs 462-487 a share for its Rs 5,235-crore initial public offering (IPO). The issue opens for subscription on May 11 and closes on May 13.
